archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.1.4f: f) the department/individual responsible for the development of each critical EUDA (e.g. individuals in the local environment or an IT function that specialises in spreadsheet and database programs)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
